title: Huawei U8150
description:
This is a procedure that can be used to install the stock firmware shipped with Ideos U8150 . Can be used to unroot your phone or maybe restoring after facing too many bugs from a custom rom .  

What you need : 

SD card : atleast 1gb and above
IDEOS U8150 Stock Rom  : which can be downloaded  here or here


Installation procedure :

1 : Make sure you phone's battery is above 60%
2 : Download the Stock ROM from the above links
3 : Unzip the UPDATE.APP  from the downloaded stock rom .
4 : Now create a folder inside your sdcard and name it dload
5 : Place the UPDATE.APP rom file inside the dload folder in your sdcard.
6 : Turn off your phone { Unplug the cable if you were using it for coping files in your sd card }
7 : Now power on you phone by pressing VOLUME UP + RED BUTTON + POWER BUTTON 

If everything went fine you will eventual see you phone saying UPDATING with a progress bar .
then after everything is done it will reboot automatically . set up everything and your phone is as good as new
